import React, { useState } from 'react' const ContactFormSection = () => { const [contactForm, setContactForm] = useState({name: '', email: '', comment: ''}) const [formErrors, setFormErrors] = useState const handleChange = (e) => { const {id, value} = e.target setContactForm({...contactForm, [id]: value}) } return (

Come in Contact with Us

) } export default ContactFormSection
